Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: This is a $(this.trait:height), $(this.trait:build) $(this.trait:animal) kitten with $(this.trait:furtype) $(this.trait:furcolor) fur and a $(this.trait:hairamount) amount of $(this.trait:hairtype) $(this.trait:haircolor) hair. $(this.trait:eyeshape) $(this.trait:eyecolor) eyes are set above a $(this.trait:noseshape) nose and mouth, complete with $(this.trait:lipshape), $(this.trait:lipcolor) lips. $(this.trait:clawlength), $(this.trait:clawtype) claws, on $(this.trait:handshape) hands, and $(this.trait:feetshape) feet are also visible. You also note her $(this.trait:earshape) ears.

This is a $(this.trait:height), $(this.trait:build) $(this.trait:animal) kitten with $(this.trait:furtype) $(this.trait:furcolor) fur and a $(this.trait:hairamount) amount of $(this.trait:hairtype) $(this.trait:haircolor) hair.
The body, either considered as the complete person, or the person without their limbs.
A pair of $(this.appearance:breasts) breasts covered in $(this.appearance:furlength) $(this.appearance:furtexture) $(this.appearance:furcolor) $(this.appearance:fur) fur.
{? equal | $(this.appearance:cheekshape) | ordinary |A pair of cheeks.|A pair of $(this.appearance:cheekshape) cheeks.}
The bone across the upper front of the body, connecting the breastbone to the shoulders.
A set ten digits not counting the toes.
{? equal | $(this.appearance:earshape) | ordinary |A pair of ears.|A pair of $(this.appearance:earshape) earlobes.}
{? equal | $(this.appearance:earshape) | ordinary |A pair of ears.|A pair of $(this.appearance:earshape) ears.}
{? equal | $(this.appearance:eyebrowshape) | ordinary |A pair of eyebrows.|A pair of $(this.appearance:eyebrowshape) eyebrows.}
Ten fingernails, at the ends of the fingers.
{? equal | $(this.appearance:hands) | ordinary |A pair of hands.|A pair of $(this.appearance:hands) hands.}
The jugular veins, running along the neck.
The arms and legs, together with their hands, feet, elbows, knees, etc..
{? equal | $(this.appearance:lipshape) | ordinary |A lower lip.|A $(this.appearance:lipshape) lower lip.}
{? equal | $(this.appearance:lipshape) | ordinary |An upper lip.|A $(this.appearance:lipshape) upper lip.}
The contractile tissue which produces movement in the human body.
A pair of nostrils, on a nose.
The little fingers of the hands, with nails at the ends.
The triangular bones across the upper back of the body, connected to the collarbone.
The sides, between the ribs and the waist.
A short tail covered in fuzzy sable fur.
A pair of temples, on either side of the forehead.
A toenail, at the end of a toe.
Ten toenails, at the ends of the toes.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: "This panther kitten is a panther, with sable fur. Orange-flecked emerald eyes are set above soft lips."
"This panther kitten is a panther, with sable fur."
"This panther kitten is a panther, with sable fur. Orange-flecked emerald eyes are set above soft lips."
"This panther kitten is a panther, with sable fur."
